content: Hoho! <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, you're back! {A拍手}There are more residents now than ever, and the planet feels more alive each day.
info: 第四瓶露卡-莫白_主流程文本II

content: This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Here, take it. Use it to water the Luca Sapling.
